document.full_text: the man suspected of firing a makeshift missile into a los angeles-area jewish community center was charged on tuesday with launching the projectile and fleeing to ohio in a bid to avoid prosecution.
document.title: l.a. chabad blast suspect charged after fleeing to ohio
lines_and_colors: the man suspected of firing a makeshift missile into a los angeles-area jewish community center was charged on tuesday with launching the projectile and fleeing to ohio in a bid to avoid prosecution.
